title: Drawing, "Vanity and Mirror", October 27, 1933
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: 10/27/33; inscribed dimensions, instructions, materials; at lower right in graphite: SCALE: 1"=1'0", 7680 [circled]; at lower right corner in red color pencil: P.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing of long, rectangular wooden vanity table and round mirror. Two sides on top of table curve upward, and base/legs curve downward. Three drawers between top and base with rectangular pulls; large drawer at center, two smaller drawers on each side. Large circular mirror above vanity with two vertical, tubular lights on each side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vanity and Mirror", October 27, 1933.
October 27, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1301.
